author: cgsavard
body: This is a copy of a PR approved by the L1T group [here](https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1192) #### PR description: This PR updates the displaced track cuts to only use variables available in the track word. The main swap is to use chi2rz/dof and chi2rphi/dof instead of chi2/dof. More on the swapping of the cuts can be seen in the GTT presentation [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1356822/contributions/5718823/attachments/2772928/4831803/GTT_disptrkjet_15_12_23.pdf) #### PR validation: Checks were made to test the jet efficiency before and after swapping the displaced jet cuts and see no significant change, as can be seen below: All code checks were performed.
title: Update displaced track jet cuts in GTT
